QuestData.Title: No Time to Waste
QuestData.Description: Commander, we're in luck. The antidote recipe is fairly simple.$B$BI was able to make a small amount with what I had on me. You should take it to Lunzul before it's too late. It should keep her alive long enough for me to make more.
QuestData.LogDescription: Administer the Spiresalve to Lunzul in Axefall.
